w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: FSTRA||ResultsAndDiscussion>>GSI>>Headnotes>>Html
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p: [Briefly summarize any effects on gonado-somatic index (GSI). Report all concentrations at which effects were observed and the direction of the effect, i.e., apparent increase or decrease when compared to control.]

g:HTMLPanel.div: Abbreviations: NA Not applicable. ND Not determined. SD Standard deviation. 1 Gonado-somatic index (%) is calculated as gonad weight (to the nearest 0.1 mg) / body weight (mg) x 100.
